text: A cold calm came over him as he realized that what he was looking for something, but that he didn't know why he was saying this. #DirkGentlysHolisiticDetectiveAgency

passages.full_quote: A terrible <used>cold calm came over him as he realized that what he was looking</used> at was a six-foot-high hologram of a housefly
